Description: Genius artist "Brush of Inspiration" guards the first stage. Few have managed to get through this stage in front of her paint brush.
OpenEyeTipsContent: Enable Insightful Prediction?\nIt is not easy to predict the thoughts of an artist though.
WinTalk: I'm sure I will reach the destination.
LoseTalk: Hey, is that all you've got? Cheer up!

Description: The calm and rational "Digital Heart" guards the second stage. Perhaps she will let you through if you can tell her a touching story.
OpenEyeTipsContent: Enable Insightful Prediction?\nUmm... But how are you supposed to predict her thoughts from her poker face?
WinTalk: My story is not over yet.
LoseTalk: Do you have more stories for me?

Description: "Lord of Kowloong" controls the life and death. How can you defeat her to pass the stage?
OpenEyeTipsContent: Enable Insightful Prediction?\nYou are brave indeed to try to predict the thoughts of a ruler like her.

Description: Soaring in the sky, "Wing of Gray Raven" is a tenacious guard and an elite warrior. You must stay vigilant to seize the victory.
OpenEyeTipsContent: Enable Insightful Prediction?\nYou may fail, but you may also succeed. It is definitely not easy to predict the thoughts of such an elite warrior.
WinTalk: You are good, but I am also growing fast.
LoseTalk: I won't let you pass easily.

Description: Behold, the smartest, strongest, "Distant Star", Nanamiâ€”with Power! If you want to get the Codex of Order, you must beat me!
OpenEyeTipsContent: Enable Insightful Prediction?\nUm... Are you sure you can predict her thoughts? She just seems to be always thinking about something incredible...
WinTalk: Finally... I can have the Codex of Order!
